FFA Plant Sales will be open Wednesday April 22nd through Sunday April 26th from 10am-2pm! We have a variety to choose from including succulents, petunias, geraniums, gazinia,Â portulaca, impatiens as well as grasses and fillers. We will be abiding by social distancing guidelines for shopper and school personnel safety. Feel free to call 308 850 5744 with any questions.

Graduation has been postponed. The CV District follows guidelines given to us by the Governor and Commissioner of Education. We will discuss graduation monthly at our Board Meetings to see when a commencement is allowable.
Seniors, there are 11 scholarships that are due this week! Contact Mrs. Shoemaker with any questions.

Due to COVID-19, the NSAA has changed requirements for Pre-Participation Physical Examinations for the 20-21 academic year. All physicals for students entering grades 8, 10, 11 & 12 that were accepted during the 19-20 academic year, will remain valid for the 20-21 academic year. Those students who are entering 7th and 9th grades will still be required to get a physical prior to their first athletic practice. Those physicals must be done after May 1, 2020!
